turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah yeah, I've got company tonight, so I want something quick. So, I'm going to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one pepperoni lover and one ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size did you want those in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know, let's just go ahead and make them both larges.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you ordered 1 large pepperoni, and 1 large ham pizza, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is. That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I think we're good on that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Usually that's fine, but I just want to make sure it's not extra to make sure those are thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is no additional charge to make it thin crust, i'll note that you want thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I appreciate that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want thin crust for both pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want them on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll place that order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'd appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know, I'm just going to go ahead and pick it up on the way home from work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that'll be actually great. Great timing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just show them your receipt which will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I will make sure I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that takes care of it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm sure we will. Thank you.
